ComicInfo.Summary: Guns are blazing in this action packed climax! We finally see the "real" Sabina for who she WAS not WHAT she IS! The Russians that built her will stop at nothing to destroy the evidence that became ADRENALYNN....even if it means annihilating an entire city! With stunning artwork by Marty Egeland, who is said to be doing the best work of his career right here in these pages, and a story that will keep you on the edge of your seats by Tony Daniel and awesome colors to compliment, you won't want to miss this one!
